text:
Yeezy has saturated conversations and all social media channels this week as the brand launched its new Season 6.

On Wednesday morning Instagram was bombarded with 'Kim Kardashian clones', where fashion influencers and celebrities including Paris Hilton sported Kim's signature blonde locks and recognisable nude hued outfits from the Yeezy lookbook Kanye created with his wife late last year.

Although we're all well-aware of the Kardashian effect, none of us were quite ready for the impact of Yeezy.

Just 24 hours after the social media campaign, Balenciaga released their SS18 lookbook, which was shot in a similar paparazzi-style to the images of Kim and her clones.

However, it's not just other designers who might be being inspired by Mr West's creative visions...

High street labels appear to be following in his footsteps too. Or rather, one in particular: Missguided

Missguided have just launched a collection that holds a striking resemblance to Yeezy's Season 6.

Missguided

Appropriately called 'Season 1' Missguided's range boasts neutral pallets, tight bandeau tops and Kim's signature cycling shorts - which all mostly retail for under a tenner.

The Internet has been quick to point out the items similarities to Yeezy's, with many calling the collection a rip-off.

Missguided

However, with a simple pair of elasticated cycling shorts by Yeezy retailing for an eye-watering $400 many would argue, isn't that the real rip off here?

Shop Missguided's Season 1 here
title: Missguided have recreated Kim Kardashian's Yeezy wardrobe for under £20

meta_data.description: The Yeezy's effect just keeps on going

og.title: Missguided have recreated Kim Kardashian's Yeezy wardrobe for less
